title: Nursing Education Curriculum Based on Expansive Case Studies to Improve Clinical Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: An educational environment focusing on stepwise case analysis and team collaboration, considering adult learner characteristics.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze changing patient conditions with ≥85% accuracy and select appropriate nursing interventions.
Learners improve self-directed learning skills by writing ≥3 reflective self-assessment reports through team-based case studies.
Learners demonstrate team communication skills with ≥3.5/4.0 scale ratings in ≥4 collaborative assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
